items.Item1: Doomed Dragon Amulet Scythe of the Elements VIII
items.strItemName: Doomed Dragon Amulet Scythe of the Elements IX
items.strItemDescription: A corrupted scythe once forged by the avatars that has found its way into your hands... Visit the Black Market Moglin to upgrade this weapon.
